titleStmt.title: De ciuilitate morun [sic] puerilium per Des. Erasmum Roterodamum, libellus nunc primum & conditus & æditus. Roberto VVhitintoni interprete. = A lytell booke of good maners for chyldren, nowe lately compyled and put forth by Erasmus Roterodam in latyne tonge, with interpretacion of the same in to the vulgare englysshe tonge, by Robert whytyngton laureate poete. Cum priuilegio
De civilitate morum puerilium. English and Latin
titleStmt.author: Erasmus, Desiderius, d. 1536.
Whittington, Robert, d. ca. 1560.

publicationStmt.publisher: In the Flete strete, at the sygne of the Sonne, by wynkyn de worde,
publicationStmt.date: The yere of our lorde god. M.CCCCC.xxxii. [1532] the. x. daye of Septe[m]bre]

notesStmt.note: Translation of: De civilitate morum puerilium.
Latin and English in parallel columns.
The last leaf bears a printer's mark.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
